Package ca.phon.query.db

Interface ResultSetManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
XMLResultSetManager
public interface ResultSetManager
An interface used for anything that manages the retrieval and storage of queries and result sets from a project.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void deleteQuery​(Project project, Query query)
    Delete the given query from the specified project.
    void deleteResultSet​(Project project, Query query, ResultSet resultset)
    Delete the specified result set from the given project and query.
    java.util.List<Query> getQueries​(Project project)
    Gets a list of queries for a specified project.
    java.util.List<ResultSet> getResultSetsForQuery​(Project project, Query query)
    Gets a list of result sets for a specified query and project.
    Query loadQuery​(Project project, java.lang.String queryName)
    Loads a given query from the specified project.
    ResultSet loadResultSet​(Project project, Query query, java.lang.String sessionName)
    Loads a given result set for a query from the specified project.
    void renameQuery​(Project project, Query query, java.lang.String newName)
    Re-name the specified query.
    void saveQuery​(Project project, Query query)
    Saves a query in the specified project.
    void saveResultSet​(Project project, Query query, ResultSet resultSet)
    Saves a query's result set in the specified project.

  • Method Details

    • getQueries

      java.util.List<Query> getQueries​(Project project)
      Gets a list of queries for a specified project.
      Parameters:
      project - the project
      Returns:
      a list of queries for the given project

    • getResultSetsForQuery

      java.util.List<ResultSet> getResultSetsForQuery​(Project project, Query query)
      Gets a list of result sets for a specified query and project.
      Parameters:
      project - the project
      query - the query
      Returns:
      the list of result sets for a given query of the given project

    • saveQuery

      void saveQuery​(Project project, Query query) throws java.io.IOException
      Saves a query in the specified project.
      Parameters:
      project - the project
      query - the query
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if the query could not be saved

    • loadQuery

      Query loadQuery​(Project project, java.lang.String queryName) throws java.io.IOException
      Loads a given query from the specified project.
      Parameters:
      project - the project
      queryName - the query name
      Returns:
      the query, if successfully loaded
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if the query could not be loaded

    • saveResultSet

      void saveResultSet​(Project project, Query query, ResultSet resultSet) throws java.io.IOException
      Saves a query's result set in the specified project.
      Parameters:
      project - the project
      query - the query
      resultSet - the result set
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if the result set could not be saved

    • loadResultSet

      ResultSet loadResultSet​(Project project, Query query, java.lang.String sessionName) throws java.io.IOException
      Loads a given result set for a query from the specified project.
      Parameters:
      project - the project
      query - the query
      sessionName - the session name
      Returns:
      the result set, if successfully loaded
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if the result set could not be loaded

    • deleteQuery

      void deleteQuery​(Project project, Query query) throws java.io.IOException
      Delete the given query from the specified project. This will also delete all associated result sets.
      Parameters:
      project -
      query -
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if the query is not found or could not be removed from the storage device.

    • deleteResultSet

      void deleteResultSet​(Project project, Query query, ResultSet resultset) throws java.io.IOException
      Delete the specified result set from the given project and query.
      Parameters:
      project -
      query -
      resultset -
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if the resultset/query is not found or could not be removed from the storage device.

    • renameQuery

      void renameQuery​(Project project, Query query, java.lang.String newName) throws java.io.IOException
      Re-name the specified query. query.setName() should not be called before using the method!
      Parameters:
      project -
      query -
      newName -
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if the query folder could not be re-named.
